TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ISymbolWriter

summary.span: 表示托管代码的符号编写器。

span.span: Represents a symbol writer for managed code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口提供了一些方法，这些方法可定义文档、序列点、词法范围和变量。The interface provides methods that define documents, sequence points, lexical scopes, and variables. > [!NOTE] > 此接口是 `ISymUnmanagedWriter` 接口的托管对应项，它是一个非托管符号存储区接口，可提供另一种方法来读取和写入调试符号信息。This interface is the managed counterpart of the `ISymUnmanagedWriter` interface, which is one of the unmanaged symbol store interfaces that provides an alternative way to read and write debug symbol information.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Close ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Close() cil managed
Public Sub Close ()
public: void Close();
abstract member Close : unit -> unit

summary.span: 关闭 ，并将符号提交到符号存储区。

span.span: Closes and commits the symbols to the symbol store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在此调用之后， 将变为无效以便进一步更新。After this call, becomes invalid for further updates.

MemberSignature.Value: public void CloseMethod ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void CloseMethod() cil managed
Public Sub CloseMethod ()
public: void CloseMethod();
abstract member CloseMethod : unit -> unit

summary.span: 关闭当前方法。

span.span: Closes the current method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 关闭方法后，不能在其中定义符号。After a method is closed, you cannot define a symbol from within it.

span.span: Closes the most recent namespace.

span.span: The points past the last instruction in the scope.

summary.span: 关闭当前词法范围。

span.span: Closes the current lexical scope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 范围关闭后，不能在其中定义变量。After a scope is closed, you cannot define a variable from within it.

param.span: 、 和 的地址类型。

span.span: The first address for the local variable specification.

param.name: addr2
param.span: 局部变量规格的第二个地址。

span.span: The second address for the local variable specification.

param.name: startOffset
param.span: 变量的起始偏移量。

span.span: The start offset for the variable.

param.span: 如果此参数为零，则忽略此参数，并在整个范围内定义该变量。

span.span: If this parameter is zero, it is ignored and the variable is defined throughout the entire scope.

param.span: 如果此参数为非 0，则该变量将位于当前范围的偏移量之内。

span.span: If the parameter is nonzero, the variable falls within the offsets of the current scope.

param.name: endOffset
param.span: 变量的结束偏移量。

span.span: The end offset for the variable.

param.span: 如果此参数为零，则忽略此参数，并在整个范围内定义该变量。

span.span: If this parameter is zero, it is ignored and the variable is defined throughout the entire scope.

param.span: 如果此参数为非 0，则该变量将位于当前范围的偏移量之内。

span.span: If the parameter is nonzero, the variable falls within the offsets of the current scope.

summary.span: 在当前词法范围内定义单个变量。

span.span: Defines a single variable in the current lexical scope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `startOffset` 和 `endOffset` 参数是可选的。The `startOffset` and `endOffset` parameters are optional. 如果其值为零，则将其忽略，并在整个范围内定义变量。If their value is zero, they are ignored and the variable is defined throughout the entire scope. 如果其值为非零值，则该变量将处于当前范围的偏移量内。If their value is nonzero, the variable falls within the offsets of the current scope. 对于同一名称的变量，可在整个范围内的不同偏移范围内多次调用 。You can call multiple times for a variable of the same name that occurs multiple times in different offset ranges throughout a scope. （在这种情况下，开始和结束偏移量不得重叠。）(In this case, start and end offsets must not overlap.)

summary.span: 每个参数的类型从它在方法的签名内的位置获取。

span.span: The type of each parameter is taken from its position within the signature of the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在给定方法的元数据中定义了参数，则不必再次使用对此方法的调用来定义这些参数。If parameters are defined in the metadata for a given method, you do not have to define them again with calls to this method. 符号读取器需要首先在普通元数据中检查这些项，然后再使用符号存储区。Symbol readers need to check for these in the normal metadata first, and then use the symbol store.

MemberSignature.Usage: iSymbolWriter.DefineSequencePoints (document, offsets, lines, columns, endLines, endColumns)

param.name: document
param.span: 正在为其定义序列点的文档对象。

span.span: The document object for which the sequence points are being defined.

param.name: offsets
param.span: 从方法开始测量的序列点偏移量。

span.span: The sequence point offsets measured from the beginning of methods.

param.name: lines
param.span: 序列点的文档行。

span.span: The document lines for the sequence points.

param.name: columns
param.span: 序列点的文档位置。

span.span: The document positions for the sequence points.

param.name: endLines
param.span: 序列点的文档结束行。

span.span: The document end lines for the sequence points.

param.name: endColumns
param.span: 序列点的文档结束位置。

span.span: The document end positions for the sequence points.

summary.span: 在当前方法内定义一组序列点。

span.span: Defines a group of sequence points within the current method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每行和每列都定义方法中语句的开头。Each line and each column defines the start of a statement within a method. 应按偏移量的递增顺序对数组进行排序。The arrays should be sorted in increasing order of offsets. 偏移量始终是从方法开始处的偏移量（以字节为单位）。The offset is always the offset from the start of the method, in bytes.

param.name: emitter
param.span: 元数据发射器接口。

span.span: The metadata emitter interface.

param.name: filename
param.span: 向其中写入调试符号的文件名。

span.span: The file name for which the debugging symbols are written.

param.span: 某些编写器要求文件名，而其他编写器却不要求。

span.span: Some writers require a file name, and others do not.

param.span: 如果为不使用文件名的编写器指定文件名，则忽略此参数。

span.span: If a file name is specified for a writer that does not use file names, this parameter is ignored.

param.name: fFullBuild
param.span: 指示这是完全重新生成的； 指示这是增量编译。

span.span: indicates that this is a full rebuild; indicates that this is an incremental compilation.

summary.span: 设置元数据发射器接口以便与编写器关联。

span.span: Sets the metadata emitter interface to associate with a writer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 还设置将调试符号写入其中的输出文件名。 also sets the output file name where the debugging symbols are written. 此方法只能调用一次，并且必须在任何其他编写器方法之前调用。This method can be called only once and must be called before any other writer methods.

MemberSignature.Value: public void OpenMethod (System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymbolToken method);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void OpenMethod(valuetype System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymbolToken method) cil managed
Public Sub OpenMethod (method As SymbolToken)
public: void OpenMethod(System::Diagnostics::SymbolStore::SymbolToken method);
abstract member OpenMethod : System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymbolToken -> unit

param.name: method
param.span: 要打开的方法的元数据标记。

span.span: The metadata token for the method to be opened.

summary.span: 打开要向其中放入符号信息的方法。

span.span: Opens a method to place symbol information into.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的方法将成为定义序列点、参数和词法范围的调用的当前方法。The specified method becomes the current method for calls to define sequence points, parameters, and lexical scopes. 围绕整个方法，存在一个隐式词法范围。There is an implicit lexical scope around the entire method. 重新打开以前关闭的方法将会清除以前为该方法定义的任何符号。Reopening a method that has been previously closed erases any previously defined symbols for the method.

span.span: The name of the new namespace.

summary.span: 打开一个新的命名空间。

span.span: Opens a new namespace.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在定义命名空间中存在的方法或变量之前调用此方法。Call this method before defining methods or variables that exist within a namespace. 命名空间可以嵌套。Namespaces can be nested.

MemberSignature.Value: public int OpenScope (int startOffset);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 OpenScope(int32 startOffset) cil managed
Public Function OpenScope (startOffset As Integer) As Integer
public: int OpenScope(int startOffset);
abstract member OpenScope : int -> int

param.name: startOffset
param.span: 从方法的开始处到词法范围内第一条指令的偏移量，以字节数表示。

span.span: The offset, in bytes, from the beginning of the method to the first instruction in the lexical scope.

summary.span: 在当前方法中打开新的词法范围。

span.span: Opens a new lexical scope in the current method.

returns.span: 一个不透明的范围标识符，它以后可以与 一起使用，以定义范围的起始和结束偏移量。

span.span: An opaque scope identifier that can be used with to define the start and end offsets of a scope at a later time.

returns.span: 在这种情况下，忽略传递到 和 的偏移量。

span.span: In this case, the offsets passed to and are ignored.

returns.span: 范围标识符只在当前方法中有效。

span.span: A scope identifier is valid only in the current method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此范围将成为新的当前范围，并推送到作用域的堆栈上。This scope becomes the new current scope and is pushed onto a stack of scopes. 范围必须构成层次结构。Scopes must form a hierarchy. 同级不允许重叠。Siblings are not allowed to overlap. 范围标识符只在当前方法中有效。Scope identifiers are valid only in the current method.

span.span: The metadata token for which the attribute is being defined.

param.name: name
param.span: 属性名称。

span.span: The attribute name.

param.name: data
param.span: 特性值。

span.span: The attribute value.

summary.span: 在给定特性名称和特性值的情况下，定义特性。

span.span: Defines an attribute when given the attribute name and the attribute value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法仅与符号信息关联，而不是元数据自定义特性。The method is only associated with symbolic information and is not a metadata custom attribute.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetUnderlyingWriter (IntPtr underlyingWriter);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetUnderlyingWriter(native int underlyingWriter) cil managed
Public Sub SetUnderlyingWriter (underlyingWriter As IntPtr)
public: void SetUnderlyingWriter(IntPtr underlyingWriter);
abstract member SetUnderlyingWriter : nativeint -> unit

param.name: underlyingWriter
param.span: 指向表示此基础编写器的代码的指针。

span.span: A pointer to code that represents the underlying writer.

summary.span: 设置基础 （对应的非托管接口），托管 使用它来发出符号。

span.span: Sets the underlying (the corresponding unmanaged interface) that a managed uses to emit symbols.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基础 `ISymUnmanagedWriter` （对应的非托管接口）表示托管代码的符号编写器。The underlying `ISymUnmanagedWriter` (the corresponding unmanaged interface) represents a symbol writer for managed code. 接口提供用于定义文档、序列点、词法范围和变量的方法。The interface provides methods for defining documents, sequence points, lexical scopes, and variables.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetUserEntryPoint (System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymbolToken entryMethod);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetUserEntryPoint(valuetype System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymbolToken entryMethod) cil managed
Public Sub SetUserEntryPoint (entryMethod As SymbolToken)
public: void SetUserEntryPoint(System::Diagnostics::SymbolStore::SymbolToken entryMethod);
abstract member SetUserEntryPoint : System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymbolToken -> unit

param.name: entryMethod
param.span: 方法的元数据标记，它是用户入口点。

span.span: The metadata token for the method that is the user entry point.

summary.span: 将用户定义的方法标识为当前模块的入口点。

span.span: Identifies the user-defined method as the entry point for the current module.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这通常是 main 方法，而不是 main 方法之前的编译器生成的存根。This is normally your main method, rather than compiler-generated stubs before the main method.

MemberSignature.Value: public void UsingNamespace (string fullName);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void UsingNamespace(string fullName) cil managed
Public Sub UsingNamespace (fullName As String)
public: void UsingNamespace(System::String ^ fullName);
abstract member UsingNamespace : string -> unit

param.name: fullName
param.span: 命名空间的完全限定名称。

span.span: The fully qualified name of the namespace.

summary.span: 指定在打开的词法范围内使用给定的、完全限定的命名空间名称。

span.span: Specifies that the given, fully qualified namespace name is used within the open lexical scope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 关闭当前范围会阻止此作用域使用该命名空间。Closing the current scope prevents this scope from using the namespace. 命名空间仍在继承自当前打开范围的所有范围内使用。The namespace remains in use in all scopes that inherit from the current open scope.
